item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m 0x03c6. My interests include programming, compiler theory, theoretical computer science, vulnerability research and playing CTFs. Feel free to look around, this site is primarily a place to store and archive challenge writeups, explanations, notes on topics I’m currently researching, or just rants. If you want to reach out to me, you can find me via the following contacts. Github Twitter Mastadon Email
item.content:
Hello, I’m 0x03c6.

My interests include programming, compiler theory, theoretical computer science, vulnerability research and playing CTFs.

Feel free to look around, this site is primarily a place to store and archive challenge writeups, explanations, notes on topics I’m currently researching, or just rants.

If you want to reach out to me, you can find me via the following contacts.

  • Github
  • Twitter
  • Mastadon
  • Email
